spatialCoverages[*].place.infoText: Description of (a) geographic location(s) that is the subject or target of the project or activity. Use to specify or describe a geographic location in a manner not covered by previous metadata...!

spatialCoverages[*].id.infoText: Spatial region or named place that is the subject or target of the project or activity. Repeat this property to indicate different locations. Do not duplicate organisational locations
